remarks: Value of the orthocomplement of a subset (normally a subspace) of a pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ocvfval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ocvfval.i $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
ocvfval.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ocvfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
ocvfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
ocvval $p |- ( S C_ V -> ( ._|_ ` S ) = { x e. V | A. y e. S ( x ., y ) = .0. } ) $.
$d ., x y $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d x y $.
